Content.Knowledge Point: The Tao as the source of all knowledge and wisdom
Content.Text: The Tao is the mother of all things. Knowing the mother, one also knows the sons. Knowing the sons, yet remaining in touch with the mother, brings freedom from the fear of death.
People's understanding of people cannot compare with the Tao's understanding. If people understood people perfectly, then wouldn't we all agree on how they work, and why they do what they do?
Tao not only sees and understands all truth, it is the very embodiment of truth itself. But despite this, it does not try to win other people over to its way of thinking.

Content.Knowledge Point: The importance of connecting with the Tao
Content.Text: At the end of the day, the only thing that will bring harmony, peace, and safety is our connection with Tao, and so we are encouraged to make that our number one priority.
